trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around September 4th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was photographing the sky on two different days because the clouds were unusal one day very lacy and the sunset was nice the next day; and both times very pretty. I did not see the discs until I was zooming in on the photographs to see the detail. Both objects seem disc-like and shiny. I seem to be having a fair number of recent sightings and am so glad to have captured these on digital media, even though I did not notice them at the time. These were taken the middle of the first week in september in North Central Texas. The photos were taken with a Sony Cybershot 7.2 megapixel camera on automatic settings. I also noticed that another person from NCT, very near by has also submited a report with photos of similar object.
Summary: Dayligt photos of shiny discs in clouds
